description: Objectives that entities can achieve. Often called badges or trophies

name.description: A short, human-readable name for the goal

description.description: A human-understandable description for the goal
description.example: A goal awarded when a user logs into our mobile app at least 5 times

points.description: The number of points to award to entities that completes the goal

criteria.description: A collection of criteria that must be fulfilled to complete the goal

items.description: A specific set of requirements to be fulfilled

description.description: A human-understandable description for the criterion
description.example: Log into the mobile app 5 times

targetEntityIdField.description: The field in received events which identifies the unique entity for which criterion progress is tracked

qualifyingEvent.description: An open-ended key value map that defines the events which satisfy the criterion

aggregation.description: A configuration that describes how to increment progress towards the criterion

type.description: Whether to increment criterion progress by 1 (count) or more than 1 (sum) each time a qualifying event is received

value.description: If aggregation.type='sum', then the value is added to the entity's criterion progress every time a qualifying event is received

valueField.description: If aggregation.type='sum', then the value of the field indicated by the property on the received is added to the entity's criterion progress every time a qualifying event is received

threshold.description: The value at which point the criterion is satisfied
